title: Nano-silicon enhances tomato growth and antioxidant defense under salt stress
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00770K, Paper
Shuaibing Wang, Xiang Shen, Xin Guan, Li Sun, Zhongxue Yang, Dandan Wang, Yinglong Chen, Peiqiang Li, Zhihong Xie
With the rapid expansion of applications in agriculture, nanotechnology has emerged as an effective alternative for alleviating abiotic stress in plants.
